pages.text: There are some materials in this world that can be combined with others. This entry documents some basic information on all of these combinations, known as alloys.
Bronze is a fairly cheap yet durable alloy. It has many industrial uses.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 3
Brass is a fairly cheap alloy. It has mild use in magic.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 1
Electrum is a fairly conductive alloy that can be used to make an item magnet.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 2
Steel can be created by putting iron into a blast furnace. It is very durable and strong, and is used for mid and high tier machines.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 4
Damascus steel is similar, but inferior, to steel.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 4
Black steel is another alternative to steel.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 3
Shadow steel is a sidegrade to steel, and gains power when in darkness.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 3
Angmallen is slightly better than iron.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 3
Quicksilver is a durable alloy that can be used in place of mercury in many recipes.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 5
Red alloy is very conductive of redstone power. Wires made from it will carry a signal for 16x the distance vs redstone dust.$(br) $(br)Mining level: N/A
Wearing a full set of amordrine armor will invigorate you, making you stronger.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 5
Celenegil is highly durable. It will increase your speed and strength upon slaying a monster, and a full set of armor will make you more resistant to all damage.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 6
Krik is a curious alloy. Wearing a full set of armor allows rudimentary flight by controlling the weight of its wearer.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 4
Hepatizon is a downgrade from steel.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 3

Tartarite is filled with clashing dimensional energies. It can be used to make some of the strongest 'basic' equipment (has durability, does not require energy, etc), as well as creating a portal to the Beneath.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 7
Desichalkos harnesses the powers of the End. A sword forged from it will allow you to teleport, and a full set of armor allows you to steal blocks from endermen.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 4
A full set of haderoth armor allows one to walk on lava.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 5
Inolashite is fairly durable.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 5
Etherium armor allows one to walk through walls.$(br) $(br)Mining level: 7
